landing.philosophy: We focus on balance, freshness, and honest flavor in every dish.
landing.selectionDescription: Daily curated ingredients from sustainable sources
landing.cateringDescription: Elevate your events with our premium ceviche and sushi catering. From intimate gatherings to corporate events, we bring the ocean's freshness to you.
landing.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your event date, dietary restrictions, and any special requests...
landing.thankYouMessage: Thank you for your catering inquiry! We'll contact you within 24 hours to discuss your event.
landing.cateringServicesDescription: Experience the perfect blend of Peruvian ceviche and Japanese sushi artistry. Our catering brings restaurant-quality freshness to your location.
landing.service1: Fresh ceviche bar with live preparation
landing.loyaltyDescription: Our mobile app with loyalty program. Earn points with every order and enjoy exclusive benefits.
landing.benefit2: Free delivery on all app orders
landing.ctaDescription: Reserve your table or order for delivery. An elevated dining experience awaits.
landing.footerDescription: A sanctuary of coastal flavors in the heart of the city. Where every dish tells a story of the sea.
landing.contactDescription: Whether you need catering, want promotions, or just have questions - we're here to help.
landing.quickQuestion1: What's the minimum order for catering?
landing.quickAnswer1: Minimum order is $200 for parties of 10+ people.
landing.quickQuestion2: Do you deliver to my area?
landing.quickAnswer2: We deliver within 25km of Sherbrooke. Contact us for specific locations.
landing.quickAnswer3: Yes! We offer vegetarian, gluten-free, and other custom options.
landing.quickQuestion4: How far in advance should I book?
landing.quickAnswer4: We recommend booking 2+ weeks in advance for best availability.
landing.promotionsDescription: Sign up for exclusive deals and menu updates.
landing.promotionsPlaceholder: Let us know what type of promotions you're interested in...
landing.generalPlaceholder: How can we help you today?
landing.thankYouCatering: Thank you for your catering inquiry! We'll contact you within 24 hours to discuss your event.
landing.thankYouPromotions: Thank you for signing up! You'll receive our latest promotions and updates.
landing.thankYouGeneral: Thank you for your message! We'll get back to you within 24 hours.
landing.submissionError: There was an error submitting your form. Please try again or contact us directly.

catering.title: MaiSushi Catering
catering.subtitle: Elevate your events with authentic Japanese cuisine, crafted with precision and brought to your venue.
catering.experienceDescription: For over a decade, MaiSushi has been bringing the authentic taste of Japan to Sherbrooke's most memorable events. From intimate gatherings to grand celebrations, our catering service combines traditional techniques with modern presentation.
catering.essentialDescription: Perfect for office lunches and small gatherings
catering.premiumDescription: Elevated experience for corporate events and celebrations
catering.omakaseDescription: Ultimate luxury experience with chef consultation
catering.step1Desc: Discuss your event needs and menu preferences
catering.step2Desc: Tailor your menu with our chef's guidance
catering.step3Desc: Finalize details and secure your date
catering.step4Desc: Enjoy authentic Japanese cuisine at your event
catering.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your event, dietary restrictions, or special requests...

footer.staffAdminDescription: Access your management dashboard with authorized credentials.
footer.loyaltyDescription: Earn points with every order. Redeem for exclusive rewards and discounts.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At MaiSushi, operated by Pacifique Resto Inc. and powered by SherDev, we comply with Quebec Law 25 and Canada's PIPEDA regulations to protect your privacy.

section1.title: 1. Information we collect
section1.name: Name and surname
section1.ip: IP address and basic technical data

section2.title: 2. How we use your information
section2.account: Manage your account and loyalty points

section6.title: 6. Security
section6.security: We apply encryption, access control and internal audits to protect your data.

cookies.title: Cookies Policy
cookies.intro: MaiSushi uses essential cookies to enhance your browsing experience.
cookies.analyticsDescription: Analytics cookies only activate with your consent under Law 25.
cookies.disableDescription: You can delete or disable cookies through your browser settings.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.intro: By using MaiSushi, you agree to the following terms:

section1.title: 1. Use of service
section1.content: You agree to use the platform legally and respectfully and comply with Quebec laws.

section2.title: 2. Accounts and security
section2.suspension: Accounts may be suspended for misuse

section4.title: 4. Intellectual property
section4.content: All branding and content belong to Pacifique Resto Inc. and SherDev.

section5.title: 5. Liability
section5.content: MaiSushi is not responsible for interruptions or data loss caused by system usage.

cookieBanner.title: Cookie Preferences
cookieBanner.subtitle: We care about your privacy
cookieBanner.description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content. You can choose which types of cookies to allow.

instructions.title: How to Use
steps: Click on an order from the queue to start preparation
Check off steps as you complete them
Mark the order as ready when all items are prepared
